ProjectTitle: C3weed: Knowledge-based use of seaweed in food products based on techno-functional, nutritional and sensorial properties
InitialFeedbackHistory: 08/11/2024 [REDACTED] used an older DMP template, for your future DMPs, please use the [REDACTED] standard DMP template which you can find in https://dmponline.be/ or on the FWO website: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/ [REDACTED] please also include your physical data in the table, e.g. seaweed samples, and consider management of those, how will you document them, how will you store them, ....
